head.title: Life's a Bowl of Whiffle Balls

hedline.hl1: Life's a Bowl of Whiffle Balls

abstract.p: Jenna H D Beaufils designs fountains in Los Angeles, including one using whiffle balls; photo (S)

block.p: Affluence and increased traffic noise are adding to the demand for fountains in Los Angeles. Jenna H. D. Beaufils designs them for others, but she made a whiffle ball fountain, above, for herself. (''For fun,'' she said, ''and as a reaction to the more permanent classic fountains'' she does.) The fountain, made of whiffle balls in a clear acrylic bowl with a recirculating pump, is $350. Her custom (and more permanent) fountains are available at Fountainhead, (323) 913-0915, for $800 to $25,000.
